title: Very light
text: I remain sitted or resting most of the day. Computer work, driving, very short walks on flat terrain

title: Light
text: Gardening, housework, very easy bike rides, easy swimming, long walks on flat terrain...

title: Medium
text: Going up or down stairs, carrying things, practicing moderate intensity sports 1-2 days a week (biking, football, tennis, basketball...)

title: Intense
text: Heavy loading and unloading work, running up or down stairs. High intensity sports up to 3-4 days per week.

title: Very intense
text: Sports performed at maximum intensity, more than 4 times a week.
